    • start

      protected void start()
      Start method.

    • borrowScreen

      private void borrowScreen()
      Clear the screen upon execution in the terminal

    • enterNumberOfFreights

      private int enterNumberOfFreights()
      The user enters the number of shipments
      Returns:
      The number of freights the user wants to charter

    • objectWeightsToFreigh

      private void objectWeightsToFreigh(int numberOfFreights)
      Create an ArrayList with each of the freight's weights that the user enters
      Parameters:
      numberOfFreights - Number of freights that the user wants to charter

    • introduceWeights

      private double introduceWeights(int i)
      The user enters each of the freight's weights. It is verified that it is a double value
      Parameters:
      i - The number that the container ID will have
      Returns:
      The weight of the freight the user wants to ship

    • charteringContainers

      private void charteringContainers()
      Place each object into the containers based on their weight. Once the container is full, it will be chartered onto the ship.

    • printTotalCost

      private void printTotalCost()
      Print the ID of each container, the weight of each object it contains, as well as the total weight of the container, the price of chartering those containers, and the final price.

    • calculatePrice

      private double calculatePrice(ArrayList ship)
      Parameters:
      ship - The number of containers the ship contains
      Returns:
      Total price of shipment
